name: 5 Star Racing
overview: Buckle up and put the pedal to the metal. You are sitting behind the steering wheel of the world's most powerful vehicles as they crush, splatter, jump and roll their way to victory. Be weary, don't get worried over a few spins and screeches, because there are always thrills and spills just waiting for you around each corner. Race like you never raced before and watch out for your opponents as they want to win as much as you do. Race over 10 different tracks with 10 different cars in 5 challenging games.
